[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Offer” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ background_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0.5)” background_image=”https://discover-destinations.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/10/ee2trmn-6a0-scaled.jpg” background_blend=”color” custom_padding=”120px||79px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”80px||80px|” custom_padding_phone=”” filter_brightness=”127%” locked=”off”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_margin=”|||”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”CTA Section Title” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”]

BEAUTIFUL BALI

5 DAYS/4 NIGHTS

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ffffff” divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” animation_style=”zoom” animation_delay=”200ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”20%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”Packages” _builder_version=”3.24.1″ custom_padding=”38px||29px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”0px||0px|” custom_padding_phone=””][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” admin_label=”Packages Title” _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_margin=”-31px|auto||auto||” custom_padding=”30px|0px|21px|0px|false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”60px||0px|” custom_padding_phone=”” locked=”off”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”||||” text_text_color=”#1a1a1a” header_font=”Oswald|on||on|” header_text_align=”center” header_font_size=”60px” header_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”|||” custom_padding=”|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”]

ITINERARY

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_divider color=”#ed4441″ divider_position=”center” divider_weight=”3px” disabled_on=”off|off|off” _builder_version=”3.23.4″ max_width=”150px” module_alignment=”center” height=”0px” custom_margin=”30px|||” animation_style=”slide” animation_direction=”top” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_slide=”10%” locked=”off”][/et_pb_divider][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row admin_label=”Package” _builder_version=”3.25″ background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_padding=”27px|0px|26px|0px|false|false”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”94px” custom_margin=”-22px||47px|||” custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Oswald”]

DAY 01: ARRIVAL AT BALI

Upon arrival in Bali, meet and greet by our English speaking driver – transfer to the hotel.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”228px” custom_margin=”47px||47px||false|” custom_padding=”4px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” hover_enabled=”0″ inline_fonts=”Oswald” sticky_enabled=”0″]

DAY 02: FULL DAY UBUD AND KINTAMANI TOUR

Breakfast at the hotel.

Celuk/Mas village as a traditional village where you can see the making of gold and silver jewelry. Next visit is Kintamani stop on the road and enjoy the view of Mount and Lake Batur. The tour continue to Tegalalang Rice Terrace, the most beautiful scene of rice paddies, it’s a best spot for tourist to stop and take a picture. Ubud Monkey Forest, is the sanctuary and natural habitat of the Balinese long-tailed monkey and also there is a sacred Temple inside the forest. Later we proceed to Ubud Palace as a historical building, the official residence of The Royal Family Ubud. Next stop is Ubud art market as the centre of Balinese handicraft.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”118px” custom_margin=”47px||47px||true|” custom_padding=”2px||4px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” hover_enabled=”0″ inline_fonts=”Oswald” sticky_enabled=”0″]

DAY 03: ULUWATU TOUR

Breakfast at hotel. Take in Bali’s best sunset spot at Uluwatu Temple, a Balinese temple to the sea gods, with a commanding view of the ocean high on a cliff. The temple is part of a series of temples built to protect the island from evil spirits and is the permanent home to a family of friendly monkeys. After exploring the temple and watching the sunset, experience one of Bali’s most famous cultural performances, the Kecak Fire Dance. Watch the Balinese act out a scene from the Ramayana with a mesmerizing trance chant, punctuated by exciting fire dances by performers in intricate costumes. An unforgettable evening of Balinese culture that the whole family can enjoy. 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”-2px||-2px||true|” custom_padding=”4px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” hover_enabled=”0″ inline_fonts=”Oswald” sticky_enabled=”0″]

DAY 04: ULUNDANU & TANAH LOT TEMPLE TOUR

Breakfast at hotel – First visit is Candi Kuning fruit market, you can buy all variety of local fresh fruit and vegetable – Nest Visit is Ulundanu Temple is a temple dedicated to the goddess of the lake is Ida Batari Dewi Ulun Danu on the edge of a huge crater – our last visit is Tanah Lot Temple to enjoy the sunset on a beautiful scenery of a Temple on the rock.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”4.6.6″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” custom_margin=”47px||47px||true|” custom_padding=”10px||0px|||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” hover_enabled=”0″ inline_fonts=”Oswald” sticky_enabled=”0″]

DAY 05: NUSA PENIDA ISLAND TOUR

Breakfast at hotel – Enjoy the tour to Nusa Penida Island, a small, beautiful Island as part of Bali which famous with the best beach view. The tour departs at 07.00 from hotel to the harbor. Local menu lunch is included and will be served at local restaurant, including 1x snorkeling, tour to Kelingking Beach, Broken beach and angel billabong beach, and return to hotel around 17.00 pm.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text admin_label=”Description” _builder_version=”3.27.4″ text_font=”Roboto||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.8em” background_size=”initial” background_position=”top_left” background_repeat=”repeat” min_height=”100px” custom_margin=”-1px|||||” custom_padding=”6px|||||” animation_style=”zoom” animation_direction=”left” animation_delay=”100ms” animation_intensity_zoom=”10%” inline_fonts=”Arial,Oswald,Georgia”]

DAY 06: DEPARTURE FROM BALI

After breakfast, hotel check out and Kuta shopping during transfer to airport.

HAVE SAFE AND NICE JOURNEY!

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ custom_padding_last_edited=”on|tablet” admin_label=”More Places” _builder_version=”3.0.76″ min_height=”926px” custom_margin=”-114px||-147px|||” custom_padding=”66px||0px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”80px||80px|” custom_padding_phone=”” global_module=”117″ saved_tabs=”all” locked=”off”][et_pb_row column_structure=”1_3,1_3,1_3″ _builder_version=”4.6.5″ min_height=”0px” custom_margin=”-2px|auto||auto||” custom_padding=”1px|0px||0px||”][et_pb_column type=”1_3″ _builder_version=”3.25″ custom_padding=”|||” custom_padding__hover=”|||”][et_pb_blurb url=”http://www.facebook.com/pages/Discover-Destinations/156630901051625″ use_icon=”on” font_icon=”%%291%%” icon_color=”#0c71c3″ _builder_version=”3.15″]
